'use strict';
 
var Node = require('./Node');
var isArray = Array.isArray;
const isValidJavaScriptVarName = require('../util/isValidJavaScriptVarName');
 
class Literal extends Node {
    constructor(def) {
        super('Literal');
        this.value = def.value;
    }
 
    generateCode(codegen) {
 
        if (this.value != null) {
            Iif (isArray(this.value)) {
                this.value = codegen.generateCode(this.value);
            } else if (typeof this.value === 'object') {
                if (!(this.value instanceof RegExp)) {
                    var newObject = {};
                    for (var k in this.value) {
                        Eif (this.value.hasOwnProperty(k)) {
                            newObject[k] = codegen.generateCode(this.value[k]);
                        }
                    }
                    this.value = newObject;
                }
            }
        }
        return this;
    }
 
    writeCode(writer) {
        var value = this.value;
        writer.writeLiteral(value);
    }
 
    toString() {
        var value = this.value;
        if (value === null) {
            return 'null';
        } else Iif (value === undefined) {
            return 'undefined';
        } else if (typeof value === 'string') {
            return JSON.stringify(value);
        } else if (value === true) {
            return 'true';
        } else Iif (value === false) {
            return 'false';
        }  else Iif (isArray(value)) {
            return '[' + value.join(', ') + ']';
        } else Eif (typeof value === 'number') {
            return value.toString();
        } else if (value instanceof RegExp) {
            return value.toString();
        } else if (typeof value === 'object') {
            let keys = Object.keys(value);
            if (keys.length === 0) {
                return '{}';
            }
 
            var result = '{ ';
 
            for (let i=0; i<keys.length; i++) {
                let k = keys[i];
                let v = value[k];
 
                if (i !== 0) {
                    result += ', ';
                }
 
                if (isValidJavaScriptVarName(k)) {
                    result += k + ': ';
                } else {
                    result += JSON.stringify(k) + ': ';
                }
 
                result += v;
            }
 
            return result + ' }';
        }
    }
}
 
module.exports = Literal;
